name: Late Night (quinnliu)
description:
Late Night is an interactive story and a workplace mystery game. You will make decisions between guarding the front security gate and building relationships with the patients/staff until you end up at the center of a larger conspiracy. 

Credits:

Programmer: Emma Lisowski

Design / Environment Art: Quinn Liu

Character Art/Design/Music: Olivia Siu

Design/Producer: Blake Becton
